title: post 1
content: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.

title: post 2
content: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.

title: post 3
content: Every moment in our lives is a miracle we should enjoy instead of ignoring.

title: post 4
content: A dream you dream alone is only a dream. A dream you dream together is reality.

title: post 5
content: Sometimes I am happy and sometimes not. I am, after all, a human being, you know. And I am glad that we are sometimes happy and sometimes not. You get your wisdom working by having different emotions.
